actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution reauthorizing the Albert Einstein Congressional Fellowship Program.

summary.text: Authorizes the President Pro Tempore of the Senate to enter into an agreement with the Triangle Coalition for Science and Technology Education to establish an Albert Einstein Congressional Fellowship Program providing for two fellowships within the Senate in each fiscal year, beginning in FY 1991. Provides for the agreement only if the Triangle Coalition for Science and Technology meets certain program requirements. Albert Einstein Senate Fellowship Program Resolution - Reauthorizes the provisions of the following measures of the 102d Congress: (1) S.Res. 173; (2) S.Res. 208; and (3) S.Res. 228.

titles.title: A resolution reauthorizing the Albert Einstein Congressional Fellowship Program.
